Reviews.Title: “Casa Banzo - well placed with great staff!”
Reviews.Author: seattlexs
Reviews.Content: friend booked separate 5 nights recently casa appointed breakfasts fine value money pluses primary housekeeper jack trades total sweetheart doesnt speak english sweet helpful maria spoke english day oriented breakfast hot tea hot milk delish croissant super comfy bed 2nd floor location minuses floor noise construction day saturday sound radiated upper floors floor bed comfy shower sort ikeaish overall stay ghetto near campo di fiori try di corner yum

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Area- Perfect place.”
Reviews.Author: Vered B
Reviews.Content: stay casa 5 nights location perfect minute campo de fiori 5 minutes piazza navona clean decorated hed homely feel owners sweet option chack departure day love casa trip rome

Reviews.Title: “Very good place!”
Reviews.Author: Lilivonmarlene
Reviews.Content: stayed nights casa location excellent close campo di fiori largo argentina buses trams accomodation nice kitchen washing machine etc service excellent girl reception helpful nice maybe breakfast bit scarce limited croissant person marmelade coffee tea juice that´s 5€ maybe add croissant bigger real toasts packed ones anyway improved rest

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful apartment in a great location”
Reviews.Author: business_traveller73
Reviews.Content: found stay casa perfect return rome location ideal close campo dei fiori pantheon piazza navona trastevere stayed self contained apartment ground floor homely decorated clean peaceful building beautiful courtyard makes restful quiet heart historic centre courtyard beautiful wisteria imagine spring spectacular owners helpful

Reviews.Title: “Charming budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: La_Butte
Reviews.Content: sister cousin shared triple nights october nicely decorated liked location couple blocks campo little tricky hang day breakfast adquate price definitely

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for our stay in Rome”

Reviews.Content: casa perfect stay rome rome 3 days kicking week italian vacation vibrant town campo de fiori shopping fashion cafes restaurnats walking distance 10 min piazza novona 10 min pantheon 30 mins villa 40 mins vatican transit casa train station trastevere train goes pretty directly airport train local rome transit tram takes accross tiber pretty hotel agree casa tucked mainly pedestrian street witha ll shops cafes close quiet night windows centre lovely enclosed courtyard sleep outdoor sign simply street address google print map beforehand anna stay lovely girl helpful speak english eagar please matter speak english graceful decorated style ours exposed brick arch historic building wifi fridge cups etc plus little table snack nightcap near campo de fiori wonderful lively market people watching shops cafes heard bb frommers breakfast included rate didnt particularly breakfast cafe steps hte price wonderful cafe late croisant fresh oj helpful bb owners italy pay cash credit card fees business owners reserved credit card paid cash stay night oct 2010
